seo_keywords: Dyson V15 particle count not working

problems.title: Laser Light Not Working
problems.description: The green laser on the fluffy head is off.
possible_causes: Switch on the head is off
solution_steps: Check the small toggle switch on the cleaner head.

problems.title: Filter Cleaning Message Persists
problems.description: Screen says filter needs washing after washing.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a V15 Detect / Absolute?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $308 vacuum, and extending the life of your Dyson is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my V15 Detect / Absolute needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include reduced performance and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my V15 Detect / Absolute myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
